author: costin
msg: - added server.modules
- added "tomcat.dist" - it is a better name than tomcat.home. It have the
same value, nothing should change
- started ( commented out) a modularization of build.xml ( so that each
sub-module will have its own build and can be developed independently)

author: costin
msg: Replaced <connector> with <interceptor> in config files.
<connector> should still work ( except for shutdown using the Ajp12 message,
that means the new ajp12 must be used. We can easily back off if the
interceptors will fail )

author: costin
msg: - Added code to detect what methods are overriden in interceptors.
This allows to call only the interceptors that are interested in a certain
event.
- copied the comments from Request and ContextInterceptor to BaseInterceptor.
- moved the code handling interceptors from ContextManager to Container.
This is based on Nacho's changes that allows setting per/container interceptor.
- added individual chains. Right now this duplicates the old system,
after more tests the old requestInterceptors[] will be removed and replaced
by the new chains.
- Updated comments in ContextManager, removed old debug messages, removed unused
code hanging around

author: costin
msg: Added command line option to specify additional classpath.
java -jar doesn't pass CLASSPATH or -cp ( at least on JDK1.3 )

author: costin
msg: Refactoring - moved the timers ( or accounting system ) in a separate class.
This is shared by ContextManager, Request and other classes that need
to store timing, usage counters, etc.
It need a nice web page to display the information.
